search.name: GuiaSP - Mapas
search.description:
Find maps and addresses in some cities of Brazil. Both number and city are optional. Sao Paulo is default and the other available cities are Rio de Janeiro, Belo Horizonte and Salvador.
Usage:
guiasp <street name> [<number>] [({sp | rj | bh | sa})]
Examples:
guiasp paulista 1000
guiasp brasil 200 (rj)
